function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation leading to high airborne infection risk","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Maximizing outdoor air ventilation and reducing occupancy in indoor spaces","Technologies":"Ventilation control systems, air purifiers","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate source reduction and management of indoor events","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne disease transmission during indoor events","Mitigation":"Implementing source reduction strategies, such as timetabling and purging between events","Technologies":"Ventilation control systems, air purifiers, scheduling systems","People":"Organizers and attendees of indoor events","Owner":"Event organizers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Underestimation of the effectiveness of masks in reducing transmission","Impact":"Missed opportunity to mitigate disease transmission in public settings","Mitigation":"Promoting and enforcing mask-wearing in public settings, along with education on proper mask use","Technologies":"N/A","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health authorities, governments"}]}
